document_data.name: Moonfire
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moonfire''''' was a [[divine]] [[necromancy]] spell that released a blast of lunar energy that was particularly harmful to the [[undead]].
document_data.Effects:
When this spell was cast, the [[cleric]] shot forth a broad beam of "white fire". The blast of ''moonfire'' was cold, rather than hot, and shot forth in 10-foot-wide (3.0 meter) arc that extended out for 30 feet (9.1 meters).

In addition to damaging and chilling those caught in its blast, ''moonfire'' revealed any [[magic]]al [[aura]]s, repelled electrical bolts, and greatly damaged the [[undead]].
document_data.History: This spell was contained within the [[ring]]s that composed ''[[the Moonweb]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
